#summary A short summary of Clojure tips, tricks and resources.

= Introduction =


= IDE =
Clooj console is suitable for quick start with Clojure. It can be downloaded from https://github.com/arthuredelstein/clooj/downloads.

= Links =
  * _Clojure_ - http://clojure.org/
  * _!ClojureDocs_ - http://clojuredocs.org/
    * _Clojure Quick Reference_ - http://clojuredocs.org/quickref/Clojure%20Core
  * _Clojure - Functional Programming for the JVM_ - http://java.ociweb.com/mark/clojure/article.html
    * comprehensive introduction to the Clojure programming language
  * _Coming close to Clojure_ - http://codingndesign.com/blog/?p=239
    * Video tutorial showing usage of Clojure
  * _Clojure Contrib_ - http://clojure.github.com/clojure-contrib/
    * set of useful namespaces
  * _Learn Clojure_ - http://learn-clojure.com/
    * another web page showing how to start with Clojure
  * Online Clojure Console - http://www.try-clojure.org/
